explainability.reason: Repeated emotionally charged framing and rapid repetition of similar claims across multiple public platforms.

narratives.title: Polarizing Community Messaging
narratives.summary: Increase in emotionally charged language framing community identity as being under threat.
indicators: Repeated use of exclusionary or divisive terms
High repost velocity within short time windows
Similar phrasing echoed across multiple public platforms

narratives.title: Misinformation Amplification
narratives.summary: Recurring unverified claims spreading rapidly across public discussion spaces.
indicators: Low diversity of original information sources
Lack of corroborating or authoritative references

narratives.title: Event-Driven Emotional Surge
narratives.summary: Short-term spikes in emotional reactions linked to a recent public event.
indicators: Sudden increase in emotionally charged keywords
Sharp volume spike within a 24–48 hour window
